claim_card.claim: Large-scale cosmic structure (filaments/voids/attractors) is attributed to ‘gravitational turbulence’ producing recursive phase networks; Φ is asserted to regulate the balance between curvature and expansion across scales.
claim_card.test_hook: Define measurable proxies for ‘phase network’ and the stated balance; test against cosmological simulation outputs for discriminating predictions.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Cosmic webs thus form as recursive phase networks ... Φ regulates the balance between curvature ... and expansion
